Commands.No Mercy: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack.  Deals more damage when targets are debuffed.
Commands.Bloodfest: 2-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.  HP damage is divided equally amongst all targets.  Grants a low probability of inflicting Small Max BRV Down for 3 turns.  Deals more damage when targets are debuffed.
Commands.Set Defense Down: Inflicts 「Medium Defense Down」 to all enemies for 2 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

Passives.No Mercy Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with No Mercy.
Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Bloodfest Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Bloodfest.
Passives.Back Attack: Slightly raises BRV Damage when attacking an enemy not targeting self.
Passives.No Mercy Charge: Increases the max uses of No Mercy by 1.
Passives.Debuff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Bloodfest Charge: Increases the max uses of Bloodfest by 1.
Passives.The Eternal Problem Cadet: Slightly raises BRV damage when using an AoE
Passives.Debuff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.No Mercy Extend: Increases No Mercy's max uses by 1.Raises its number of hits to 2.Slightly raises its total potency.Triggers an HP attack when BRV is over 80% Max BRV.Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+ for 6 turns after using No Mercy.HP Attack+ is a ranged AoE BRV+HP Attack.HP damage is divided amongst all targets.
Passives.Bloodfest Extend: Increases Bloodfest's max uses by 1.Greatly raises its potency.BRV stolen from the target can overflow up to 150% of Max BRV.Slightly raises the potency of Max BRV Down.Grants Sorceress' Knight for 6 turns.Sorceress' Knight raises Max BRV, Attack and Debuff Success Rate.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 6 turns after using Bloodfest.BRV Attack+ is a ranged AoE BRV attack that deals more damage to debuffed targets.
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Set Defense Down Extend: When using  Set Defense Down , adds the following effect:- Slightly raises Attack for 2 turns when an enemy is afflicted with debuffs

Weapons.Imperial CP: 35: Increases Bloodfest's potency and raises BRV damage when there is only one target.Increases the potency of Max BRV Down, raises its success rate and extends its duration.Grants Small Max BRV Up for 6 turns.
Weapons.Hyperion CP: 15: Increases No Mercy's potency and moderately raises BRV damage when there is only one target.Grants a medium probability of inflicting Small Attack Down for 6 turns.
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Set Defense Down  use +1Duration of  Set Defense Down  effects +2 turns
